column5: GUMBY?
I think Gumby is doing fine after he came out of the closet he and Pokey took off to the Brokeback mountains!
"Pokey"    hahahahahahahaha....  this thrread is already in trouble....
I work for Gumby!  Look at our logo: Coast Paper
I've got him locked up in a box full of toys down in the cold cellar. My little guy would be around 40 by now...funny how he never grows!
I'm a huge Gumby fan   I have two of them on display, plus a movie somewhere around here, now if only I could find the blockheads and the others...wait a minute I work for the block heads  Maureen
He was a little green clump of clay, wasn't he? LOL
Government job?  JF
Might was well be....TTC Wheel Trans...

from what I heard  like so many other child stars as he got older he couldn't get a job, had quite a few run ins with the law, he tried adult movies but couldn't get it up without Pokey....   was caught playing with his dough in a movie theatre.. and went down hill from there...  stabbed a guy over a line of coke and is doing 15 to life in Middletown correction centre   well that's what I heard
Terry , after he was paroled he bought some gyco insurance and turned his life around and hooked up with that cabbage patch kid.

Him and the Gecko have a side deal goin on right now that involves shipments from South America. Once the mob finds out there will be a hit out on them both. Maybe a witness protection program is needed here. Pokey...? Last I heard he was down from Brokeback Mountain and in a rehab center along with Lindsay Lohan and Britney. Could he be reformed back to a heterosexual...? Wait and see.

I hope that little green glob of clay is gone for good.  He stole my - Super Slider Snow Skates - Popeil Pocket Fisherman - "Bay City Rollers" Album - Afro - Leather (fake) Platform Shoes with Side Zipper - Rubik's cube (with one matching side, was as far as I could get) - Furry Snow Boots.  If I see the Little *%#@ he's going in the microwave.    Hookset.
So hookset... you want everything back BUT the Bay City Rollers album... correct! LOL
I believe he is working for Britney as a life coach! HH
S-A-T-U-R-D-A-Y   NIGHT S-A-T-U-R-D-A-Y   NIGHT  LOL  He can keep the Afro too Irish.   Hookset.
I'd like mine back! Didn't need a touque to keep my nogin warm!
I'd say he's doin' jus fine........    Mmmmm
I guess my "gumby on the beach" pics were a little racey and got deleted.  Take it from me though,  He's doin' alright!

And just what is wrong with the Bay City Rollers??? LOL I actually saw them in an outdoor concert last August. But they weren't the reason that I went. The concert also included Orleans, Tommy Tutone and Edgar Winter. I really wanted to see Mr. Winter. But I must admit that the BC Rollers were entertaining.
That picture is just too damn funny. The guitarist in red has gotta be wearing a rug on his head. It just doesn't look right. He shoulda just sucked it up like their mad dog drummer did.   Hookset.
